```lean
import Mathlib.Analysis.SpecialFunctions.Sqrt

noncomputable section

open Real

def G (r : â„) : â„ :=
  â¨… m n : â„¤, |r - sqrt (m^2 + 2*n^2)|

theorem limit_G_r : Filter.Tendsto G Filter.atTop (nhds 0) := by
  have : âˆ€ Îµ > 0, âˆƒ R, âˆ€ r > R, G r < Îµ := by
    intros Îµ Îµ_pos
    obtain âŸ¨M, hMâŸ© := Archimedean.arch 1 Îµ (by linarith)
    refine âŸ¨âˆš(M^2 + 2*M^2), Î» r hr => _âŸ©
    have : âˆƒ m n : â„¤, r = sqrt (m^2 + 2*n^2) := sorry -- Diophantine approximation
    obtain âŸ¨m, n, hrâŸ© := this
    rw [G, â†hr, abs_sub_lt_iff] at hM
    exact hM
  refine Filter.tendsto_of_tendsto_of_tendsto_of_le_of_le tendsto_const_nhds _ (Î» _, abs_nonneg _) _ 
  { intro Îµ Îµ_pos
    obtain âŸ¨r, hrâŸ© := this Îµ Îµ_pos
    refine âŸ¨r, Î» t ht => _âŸ©
    exact (hr t ht).le }
  { intro Îµ Îµ_pos
    obtain âŸ¨r, hrâŸ© := this Îµ Îµ_pos
    refine âŸ¨r, Î» t ht => _âŸ©
    exact (hr t ht).le }
```

```lean
theorem limit_G_r_exists_and_equals_zero :
  âˆ€ (G : â„ â†’ â„) (r : â„), (âˆ€ r > 0, G r = (min {abs (r - real.sqrt (m^2 + 2 * n^2)) | m n : â„¤})) â†’
  Filter.Tendsto G Filter.atTop (nhds 0) :=
begin
  intros G r hG,
  apply Filter.Tendsto.congr' _ (Filter.Tendsto_const_nhds),
  filter_upwards [] with _ using hG,
end
```
